description:
Season to season, this ultralight down bag provides warmth for frosty spring and autumn nights. The exterior fabric is ultra-thin 15-denier ripstop nylon with a finish that sheds condensation. Lightweight trims and features round out the package for fast-and-light adventures in the mountains.

  • Shell and lining are incredibly light and compressible 15-denier ripstop nylon
  • Insulated with ultra-premium 900 fill-power down: lots of warmth, exceptionally light weight
  • Down insulation is certified to the Global Recycling Standard which ensures accurate content claims and good working conditions while minimizing harmful environmental impact
  • Full-length zipper plus a shorter side zipper for ventilation allows use in warmer weather
  • Adjustable hood helps seal out the cold
  • Back panels without insulation to save weight, pairs with an insulated sleeping pad
  • Ultralight Cordura® nylon stuff sack
name: The North Face Chrysalis -7C Down Sleeping Bag - Unisex
